General.Name: Linzhou Heavy Machinery Group Co Ltd
General.Description: Linzhou Heavy Machinery Group Co.,Ltd manufactures and sells coal mining machinery in China. The company offers roadheaders, coal shearers, belt conveyors, scraper conveyors, metal top beams, adjustable speed hydraulic couplings, torque-limiting hydraulic couplings, software and hardware rescue capsules, mine continuous hoists, iris recognition products, electro-hydraulic control systems, casting and forging accessories, single and caving hydraulic support products, and covered coal hydraulic support products, as well as cover type large mining height hydraulic support products. It is also involved in sales and warehousing transportation, and cast steel forging business; energy equipment manufacturing; financial leasing services; and military equipment manufacturing, as well as explosion-proof electrical appliances, coal mine operation services, maintenance, and leasing services. Linzhou Heavy Machinery Group Co.,Ltd was founded in 1982 and is based in Linzhou, China.
